attributes.action: Fly the UK flag on all Scottish government buildings every day of the year.
attributes.additional_details: Our Scottish  Government want to fly it one day a year. We are part of the UK & feel it should be flown as part of the UK.
attributes.background: Discuss the UK flag on all Scotland’s government buildings & not give priority to the EU flag.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
